name: Scream Run - Go & Jump with sound & voice control
name_original: Scream Run - Go & Jump with sound & voice control
description:
Sound control game 3d!
You can use the sound with different levels to control bird, it can slow or fast jump to across obstacles!

See and feel!
The one of voice control games 3d with quality visuals, super cute sound.
You must use the voice (small or scream) to move and jump between platforms.
Eighth note: Please allow microphone when you first launch the app.
If not, turn microphone on in "setting"=> privacy =>microphone, allow this game!
